text: Tamen wulun zai nali chuxian, dou yao xianyu beijian zhi zhong, chufei jie zhenzhu de he yue yu zhongren de he yue buneng anju, tamen ying shou zhenzhu de qian nu, tamen yao xianyu kunku zhi zhong. Zhe shi yinwei tamen bu xin zhenzhu de jixiang, erqie wang sha zhong xianzhi, zhe you shi yinwei tamen weikang zhuming, chaoyue fadu.
